description: This Kotlin source file defines the MainFragment class for an Android TV application. The class manages the UI for displaying a grid of recipes organized by category, handles user interactions such as clicking on recipes to view details, and initiates search functionality.

classes.name: MainFragment
classes.description: Main fragment for the TV app, displaying recipes in a categorized grid and handling user navigation.

methods.name: onActivityCreated
methods.description: Initializes the fragment, setting up UI elements, loading recipes, and event listeners.

methods.name: setupUIElements
methods.description: Configures UI elements such as title, headers, and colors.

methods.name: loadRecipes
methods.description: Loads recipes from data source, organizes them by category, and populates the UI.

methods.name: setupEventListeners
methods.description: Sets up click listeners for recipe items and search button.
